entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
